00032 const char *CommandShutdown::ms_usage[] = {
00033   "shutdown [now]",
00034   "",
00035   "  This command sends a shutdown request to the DfsBroker",
00036   "  server.  If the 'now' argument is given, the DfsBroker",
00037   "  will do an unclean shutdown by exiting immediately.  Otherwise",
00038   "  it will wait for all pending requests to complete before",
00039   "  shutting down.",
00040   (const char *)0
00041 };
00042 
00043 
00044 void CommandShutdown::run() {
00045   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00046   uint16_t flags = 0;
00047   EventPtr event_ptr;
00048 
00049   if (m_args.size() > 0) {
00050     if (m_args[0].first == "now")
00051       flags |= DfsBroker::Protocol::SHUTDOWN_FLAG_IMMEDIATE;
00052     else
00053       HT_THROWF(Error::PARSE_ERROR, "Invalid argument - %s", m_args[0].first.c_str());
00054   }
00055 
00056   m_client->shutdown(flags, &sync_handler);
00057 
00058   sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr);
00059 
00060 }
